viewData.name: PhiNesse Brush Short Shader Brush 17
viewData.short_description: The short shader brush┬áfeatures a small, soft brush head great for smudging out color along the lash line. Offers superb control when applying color to very small areas of the eye.
viewData.long_description: The short shader brush┬áfeatures a small, soft brush head great for smudging out color along the lash line. Offers superb control when applying color to very small areas of the eye.
